docs.title: Members

docs.text: Memes in Chilean Social Networks, an analysis. This project aims to determine the discourses associated with a meme and how these discourses change according to their local reality. For this, we are creating a large dataset of memes collected from Chile’s tweets. And we developed a site for manual classification of tweet’s images
docs.title: About

docs.text: This project aims to determine the discourses associated with a meme and how these discourses change according to their local reality. For this, we are creating a large dataset of memes collected from Chile’s tweets. And we developed a site for manual classification of tweet’s images
docs.title: Memes in Chilean Social Networks, an analysis.

docs.text: 2019 Jesús Pérez-Martín, Benjamin Bustos and Magdalena Saldana, Semantic Search of Memes on Twitter, International Communication Association (ICA), 2020. ( pdf )
